name: Senior C Developer for open source projects [Remote]
description:
Senior C Developer for popular open source projects [Remote]

As part of our Extended Lifecycle team - you will work and contribute to major, open-source projects like Apache HTTPD, OpenSSL, MySQL. You will also backport security fixed to stable, maintained versions of those projects. Become part of the team of experts and work with top-notch developers to contribute to open source.

Work is fully remote, with flexible hours, so you can plan your day and work from anywhere in the world. We are a company, who has been working remotely for 6 years, and we know how to do it right.

Join us to make the difference!

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of С programming experience
  • GNU/Linux operating system and shell scripting experience
  • Ability to work with various build systems like autotools, make and cmake
  • Experience with git-based development processes
  • Python, Perl or other scripting language knowledge will be a plus

What you will do:

  • Work on various open-source projects like Apache httpd, Python, OpenSSL, etc.
  • Backport security and bug fixes from newer upstream versions or writing patches from scratch.
  • Contribute to upstream projects
  • Create reproducers and tests for vulnerabilities.
  • Automation of routine processes like CVEs monitoring, patches applying and testing.

What we can offer you:

  • Remote working with long-term employment on a full-time basis under contract
  • Compensation in US dollars
  • Flexible working hours
  • A great opportunity for professional development within a young and fast-growing company
  • Interesting and challenging projects
  • Paid one month vacation per year and sick leaves
  • Medical insurance
  • Days off on national holidays
  • Knowledge-Exchange

Let’s make it a win-win for you and CloudLinux. Do not put off until later - apply today and our team will gladly welcome you.
